data.strDesc: Nepal Coronavirus: 357 Cases and 2 Deaths. As per the recent data provided by worldometer corona . New infected victims added today = 62.

data.strTitle: Nepal Tourism Board seeks Rs 20 billion fund to pay furloughed workers
data.strDesc: The Nepal Tourism Board has asked the government to set up a Rs20 billion coronavirus job retention fund to partially pay the salaries of furloughed tourism workers.
